channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole 12x18 inches and 2.5 inches deep at present, 2nd January
item.description:
Pothole in road near to kerb outside 29 Collum End Rise. Developing over the last fortnight and becoming larger and deeper every day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Collum End Rise, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
